english.segment1: Fire burns in the grate. The guilt burns in the breast. Of every prisoner. The guilty, the condemned. Death is red on their hands. The galling chains reminding. Every minute. The Law that was broken
english.segment2: Silent as the grave. Covering deeds, covering man. Eyes that pierce and blaze. Wounded hands, stretching out. To save
english.segment3: Moonlit nights on their knees. Stifling screams ready. To break from conscience. The voice of the innocent. So the time marches on. The future melts into the past. At last, the bitter reprieve
